entry.title: WIND WARNING , Grande-Vallée
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:36 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-la-Madeleine 10:00 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
